price: The Fire will scorch their faces, leaving them disfigured[47].
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ
footnotes: [47] Kālih means a face whose skin has been removed by scorching until the jaws are exposed.
